title: IRayTraceRendererOptions.NetworkSharedDirectory
description: Gets or sets the name of the shared network directory for network renders.
returns: Name of the shared network directory for network renders
remarks:
Using a shared network directory for network renders:
avoids having to
send scene asset data to each node on the network
.
can be faster when using many
client machines
.
NOTE:
Only SOLIDWORKS Subscription Services customers can share the effort of rendering across multiple computers.
